title: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk, eggs, and vanilla in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.

title: Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 450°F.
Roll out dough on a baking sheet.
Spread sauce, add cheese and toppings.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.

title: Pasta
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add marinara sauce and cook for 5 minutes.
Toss pasta in sauce and serve with Parmesan.

title: Salad
steps: Wash and chop lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.
Mix olive oil and vinegar to make dressing.
Toss vegetables with dressing in a bowl.
Serve fresh.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Chop onion and sauté until golden.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and coconut milk.
Simmer for 20 minutes and season with salt.

title: Sushi
steps: Cook sushi rice and mix with rice vinegar.
Place nori on a mat and spread rice evenly.
Add fish and roll tightly.
Slice and serve with soy sauce.

title: Steak
steps: Season steaks with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a skillet and add garlic and rosemary.
Cook steaks for 4-5 minutes per side.
Rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Soup
steps: Chop carrots, potato, and onion.
Boil vegetables in vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes until tender.
Blend and season with salt.

title: Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Add butter and eggs, mix until smooth.
Bake for 30 minutes in a greased pan.
